name: Dad Quest | Story Platformer Adventure
description: Embark on a great Dadventure in this unique comedy, story-based 2D platformer. Raise your child to become the weapon they were always meant to be.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel dual core processor 2GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics with 256MB memory or more Storage: 1000 MB available space
